title: Local Temperature
tooltip: A simple node.js application intended to showcase how to read analog data from a Grove Starter Kit Plus IoT Intel Edition Temperature Sensor, start a web server and communicate wirelessly using WebSockets. The HTML5 companion app is visible under App Developer Projects: Work with a Demo panel.
description: A simple node.js application intended to showcase how to read analog data from a Grove Starter Kit Plus IoT Intel Edition Temperature Sensor, start a web server and communicate wirelessly using WebSockets.
